name: brightspot-js-lazyimage
description: It's recommended that this plugin is used inside of the require/AMD space and using the brightspot-js-grunt task, as demonstrated in the BSP-101 project - Pull in via your bower.json. It will be automatically included into your project by brightspot-js-grunt task - Add "bsp-lazyimage" into your compile.js to have it be included in your JS output - Add in your markup
